location: Publika Shopping Gallery - Dutamas, Greater KL

showroom.address: Publika Shopping Gallery 1, Jalan Dutamas Solaris Dutamas Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur

description: One of the most exciting shopping centres to have emerged in Malaysia in recent years, Publika Shopping Gallery is part of Solaris Dutamas, a mixed-use development that also includes office suites, designer residential suites and shoplots. Publika is a hub where arts & culture meets retail, which attracts creative urbanites and innovative entrepreneurs
features: An Open-air, Landscaped Piazza With In-built Audio-visual Facilities For Events And Performances
Arts And Culture Platform For Local Producers Of Multidisciplinary Backgrounds To Develop And Realise Their Ideas
